_header: Do way for that may not avail ye
_description: A ballad of maxims — three 8-line stanzas

CULKk15.First Lines:
Do way ffore that may nocht awail ȝheffra fenȝheand foly
                    ay þou flee…
CULKk15.Last Lines:
…And se þow ses of surfat syneand pres þe al ways
                    with thi perys
